hints.content:
To find the number of sunny days before my birthday, we start with the $\blue{83}$ sunny days this year and subtract the $\pink{17}$ sunny days after my birthday.

$\blue{83}-\pink{17} = \green{\Box}$

![](${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/47bb21a0cee4b6547126be26450bb931.png)
There were $\green{66}$ sunny days before my birthday.

question.content:
There were several sunny days this year before my birthday.  Since my birthday, there have been $17$ more sunny days.  My birthday was not a sunny day. Altogether, there have been $83$ sunny days this year.

**How many sunny days were there before my birthday?**  

[[☃ input-number 1]] sunny days
